extDescription.message: Javadoc incremental search for packages and classes.

optionsAnchor.description: Label used for the options page anchor.

autoOpenOptionTitle.description: Title of the options page section used to configure the auto-open option.

autoOpenOptionOn.message: On. Automatically open the first package, class or method in the list after each search.
autoOpenOptionOn.description: Label displayed for the button to turn on the auto-open option.

autoOpenOptionOff.message: Off. Wait for the Enter key to be pressed.
autoOpenOptionOff.description: Label displayed for the button to turn off the auto-open option.

mergeFramesOptionTitle.message: Merge the Package and Class Frames
mergeFramesOptionTitle.description: Title of the options page section used to configure the merge frames option.

mergeFramesOptionOn.message: Yes. All packages and classes can be searched using a single combined frame.
mergeFramesOptionOn.description: Label displayed next to the button to turn on the merge frames option.

mergeFramesOptionOff.message: No. The package frame will not be hidden. Only one package can be searched at a time.
mergeFramesOptionOff.description: Label displayed next to the button to turn off the merge frames option.

classOrMethodMenuTitle.description: Title of the options page section used to configure the class/method menu.

classOrMethodMenuDescription.message: Menu displayed when pressing the @ key if a class or method is currently at the top of the search list.
classOrMethodMenuDescription.description: Further description of the class/method menu.

packageMenuTitle.description: Title of the options page section used to configure the package menu.

packageMenuDescription.message: Menu displayed when pressing the @ key if a package is currently at the top of the search list.
packageMenuDescription.description: Further description of the package menu.

default.description: Tag displayed on the default option. This applies to the boolean options only.

restoreDefault.description: Label displayed on the each button to reset a menu option to the default value.

optionsReadOnly.message: This browser does not support changing the options.
optionsReadOnly.description: Error message displayed when the options cannot be configured.
